original_text: I will punish you very strongly, because I am so angry with you. I will put you under the power of cruel men who know how to destroy people. I will punish you very strongly, because I am so angry with you. I will put you under the power of cruel men who know how to destroy people. I will punish you very strongly,
korean_text: 내가 내 분노를 네게 쏟으며 내 진노의 불을 네게 내뿜고 너를 짐승 같은 자 곧 멸하기에 익숙한 자의 손에 넘기리로다

sentences.original_text: I will punish you very strongly
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 아주 강하게 벌할 것이다

sentences.original_text: because I am so angry with you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너에게 아주 화가 났기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: I will put you under the power of cruel men
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 잔인한 사람들의 권세 아래 둘 것이다

sentences.original_text: who know how to destroy people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사람들을 어떻게 파괴하는지 아는 자들이다

sentences.original_text: I will punish you very strongly
